lyrics.stanza: Jesus bids us shine with a clear, pure light, Like a little candle burning in the night; In this world of darkness, we must shine, You in your small corner and I in mine.
Jesus bids us shine, then, for all around Many kinds of darkness in this world abound— Sin and want and sorrow; we must shine, You in your small corner, and I in mine.
